about_the_game:
“The EX Graphic Monster Pack I” features a high quality collection of 38 unique, handcrafted pixel monsters designed for side-view battles.

Additionally, the set includes several monsters with alternate colors and enhanced details.

Each monster comes in a variety of sizes, ranging from the smallest at 50 x 40 pixels (like a slime) to the largest at 228 x 215 pixels (like a snake).

Set Includes:

●     38 Monster Graphics

(20 unique Monster Graphics +18 recolored Monster Graphics)

------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

Additionally, the set includes several monsters with alternate colors and enhanced details.

Each monster comes in a variety of sizes, ranging from the smallest at 50 x 40 pixels (like a slime) to the largest at 228 x 215 pixels (like a snake).
